abstract: The company joins Google, Facebook and others in disclosing when users of email and other services have probably been targeted by hackers working on behalf of governments.
snippet: The company joins Google, Facebook and others in disclosing when users of email and other services have probably been targeted by hackers working on behalf of governments.
lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Microsoft says it will begin notifying users of its online services if they have been targets of suspected state-sponsored online attacks, joining a growing list of Internet companies stepping up their security policies with similar measures.

headline.main: Microsoft to Notify Users of Government Hackings
headline.print_headline: Microsoft to Notify Users of Government Hackings
